summary: This is an email from attorney Thomas Moyer of Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY), transmitting an additional production of documents from Deutsche Bank in response to a July 11, 2019 subpoena. It includes a cover letter and updated production index, indicating ongoing compliance with a financial investigation.

persons.name: Thomas Moyer
persons.context: He is the sender of the email, transmitting documents from Deutsche Bank to the SDNY in response to a subpoena.

events.title: SDNY Subpoena to Deutsche Bank
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York issued a subpoena to Deutsche Bank, likely for financial records related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Deutsche Bank Document Production
events.description: Deutsche Bank, through its attorney Thomas Moyer, submitted an additional production of documents to the SDNY in compliance with the July 11 subpoena.

keyFacts: Deutsche Bank was under subpoena from the SDNY (U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York) as of July 11, 2019, for documents related to the Epstein investigation.
Attorney Thomas Moyer of the law firm Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP was representing Deutsche Bank in this matter.
The email confirms an ongoing, secure document production process from Deutsche Bank to federal prosecutors, indicating a significant financial investigation into Epstein's affairs.
